Title: One Wild Moment
Writer: Claude Berri (based on an original screenplay by), Lisa Azuelos (adaptation), Lisa Azuelos (dialogue), Lisa Azuelos (screenplay), Jean-François Richet (adaptation), Jean-François Richet (dialogue), Jean-François Richet (screenplay)
Actors: Vincent Cassel, François Cluzet, Lola Le Lann, Alice Isaaz
Plot: Two friends bring their daughters with them on a beach vacation and find themselves in an awkward situation. A remake of the 1977 film "Un moment d'égarement".
